job.title: Social Media Marketing Intern
job.description: <p><strong><u>The Tease&nbsp;Media: Company Background</u></strong></p><p>The Tease is an inclusive digital media brand informed by insight, curiosity and commentary on all things hair, beauty and pop-culture. We keep professionals and consumers in-the-know and on-trend with smart, candid reporting, exclusive editorial content and podcasts.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong><u>Position Overview</u></strong></p><p>The Tease Media team is seeking a Social Media Intern to support the day-to-day operations for the brands social media platform in order to inspire and engage our audience, expand our reach and drive conversions.</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>The Social Media Intern Will</u></strong></p><ul><li>Write, edit and produce highly engaging daily posts for each social platform, including Facebook, Instagram and TikTok</li><li>Cultivate an engaged audience with high-touch communication with users across public platforms and in comment threads and DMs</li><li>Maintain cross-platform and platform-specific editorial calendar for social media content</li><li>Work with print, video, and design teams to develop cross-platform, traffic-driving social campaigns</li><li>Seamlessly execute partnership programs on social and digital channels</li><li>Monitor competitors’ social media presence, identify new opportunities, and leverage best practices.</li><li>Write, edit and curate email marketing programming for paid and non-paid issues</li><li>Ideate continued ways to innovate salon professional hair-related content to elevate the brand, including pitching of content series campaigns, salon professional partnerships (stylists/barbers), etc.</li><li>Maintain upstanding relationships with brands and salon professionals to continue building awareness within the market</li><li>Have experience with newsroom analytics tools, such as Chartbeat and Crowdtangle</li></ul><p><strong><u>&nbsp;</u></strong></p><p><strong><u>About You</u></strong></p><ul><li>You have a keen eye and a creative, forward-thinking mindset</li><li>You’re passionate about salon professional and beauty brands, stories, and design, and have a fascination with how to apply that passion across social platforms</li><li>You love working with tight-knit entrepreneurial teams</li><li>You have an understanding of industry trends, best practices, and emerging user behaviors.</li><li>You are an enthusiastic, highly-organized creative producer with the ability to work independently as well as in a team environment</li><li>You are a confident, skillful communicator</li></ul>
